title: Immediate Start Graphic and Web Designer
job_overview:
Due to an increase in work, we need another designer to join our team immediately.

You MUST be able to do the following to a high standard:
1) Logo Design
2) Graphic Design for social media, leaflets, etc
3) Website / App mock-ups in XD or Figma
4) Wordpress web design (elementor, pagebakery, oxygen, etc)
5) HTML and CSS including responsive design

We're re-listing this job because someone lied about their experience/skills. Please only apply if you can do the above to a good standard.

You will be asked to:
- Design logos
- Mock-up websites from a brief
- Build Wordpress websites from a mock-up using a page builder
- Edit wp websites
- Do responsive styling audits and make the site look good on all screen sizes
- Build basic low budget websites from brief alone (design in browser) 

We will accept those that work in their own time-zone, but would prioritise someone that will work in our time-zone either 9-5 London time, or partial cross over with our UK team 4-12. This would be 11:00 - 19:00 Manilla Time.

If you've read this then please include in your application, how experienced you are with Oxygen Builder - our favourite builder plugin. Don't worry if you haven't used it yet - it is very similar to page bakery and elementor
